request.description:
Geocodes one location per request; the input address is specified in a single parameter.

[Full description of the service](https://developers.arcgis.com/rest/geocode/api-reference/geocoding-find.htm)

The route service can be used to find the best way to get from one location to another or to visit several locations. The best route can be the quickest route for a given time of day considering the traffic conditions applicable during that time, or it can be the shortest route that minimizes the travel distance. The route service can also find the best route that visits each stop during permitted time windows you specify. 

[Full description of the service](http://resources.arcgis.com/en/help/arcgis-rest-api/index.html#/Route_service_with_synchronous_execution/02r300000036000000/) //
[View JS Demo](http://developers.arcgis.com/javascript/samples/widget_directions_basic/)

request.description: [List of variables you can use to geoenrich](http://resources.arcgis.com/en/help/arcgis-rest-api/index.html#/Get_variables/02r300000266000000/)

The Calculate Density task takes known quantities of some phenomenon and spreads these quantities across the map. You can use this task, for example, to show concentrations of lightning strikes or tornados, access to health care facilities, and population densities.

[Read more](https://developers.arcgis.com/rest/analysis/api-reference/calculate-density.htm)

The searches are performed against a high performance index that indexes the most popular fields of an item. See the [Search reference](http://resources.arcgis.com/en/help/arcgis-rest-api/02r3/02r3000000mn000000.htm) page for information on the fields and the syntax of the query.

[Read more](http://resources.arcgis.com/en/help/arcgis-rest-api/index.html#/Search/02r3000000mp000000/)

A user resource representing a registered user of the portal.
Personal details of the user, such as e-mail and groups, are returned only to the user or the administrator of the user's organization (the properties in the Response Properties table below).

[Read more](http://resources.arcgis.com/en/help/arcgis-rest-api/index.html#/User/02r3000000m2000000/)

A user resource representing a registered user of the portal.
Personal details of the user, such as e-mail and groups, are returned only to the user or the administrator of the user's organization (the properties in the Response Properties table below).

Administration token is needed

[Read more](http://resources.arcgis.com/en/help/arcgis-rest-api/index.html#/User/02r3000000m2000000/)

item.name: Check if an App is Registered

exec: tests["Not a registered app"] = jsonData.error.message === "Not a registered app";
tests["It is a registered app"] = "It is a registered app";

item.name: Add item (Ready to use - Configurable WebApp)

urlencoded.value: Web Map, Map, Online Map, Mapping Site, JavaScript, Ready To Use ,selfConfigured

request.description:
Map Journal, /share and /update item URL is required (with the returned item id)

**Share**: Something like this:
everyone:true
org:false
items:16818d5144cb44c89bafb86b38ca5468

**Update** Something like this:
url = http://{{username}}.maps.arcgis.com/apps/MapJournal/index.html?appid=<item-id>
id = <item-id>

item.name: Invite an user to an Organization

urlencoded.value: Invitation to join an ArcGIS Online organization

XXXX has invited you to join an ArcGIS Online Organization, Map GeoGeeks from Spain.

Please click this link to finish setting up your account and establish your password: https://www.arcgis.com/home/newuser.html?invitation=@@invitation.id@@

Note that your account has already been created for you with the username, @@touser.username@@.

If you have difficulty signing in, please contact Raúl Jiménez (raul.jimenez@esri.es). Be sure to include a description of the problem, the error message, and a screenshot.

For your reference, you can access the home page of the organization here:
https://geogeeks.maps.arcgis.com/home/

This link will expire in two weeks.

This is an automated email. Please do not reply.
